attributes.action: stop people busking on abbeygate st. bury st edmunds. suffolk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have lived in this street in the centre of town for two years and the buskers have ruined my life starting up at 7am and staying there till 8pm my local council will not do anything about it. i work shifts long days and long nights and i can not get any sleep . please sign so i can get a good night sleep. many thanks

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
